body_html:
The surprisin thing is that this time, i did not modify any file and it worked (for previous versions i did changes in the crosstool, typically in the local_linux toolchain, similarly to the tensorflow cross tool as i showed you in the previous post. However, i have several Environment variables set to help : set path=(/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/bin $path) set path=(/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin $path) set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/bazel/bazel-0.8.0-dist/output/ $path) set path=(/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin $path) setenv PYTHONPATH "/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/lib/python2.7/site-packages" setenv JAVA_HOME /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64/jre setenv GRPC_JAVA_PLUGIN /gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/grpc/protoc-gen-grpc-java-0.15.0-linux-x86_64.exe setenv CC /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc setenv CMAKE_C_COMPILER /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc setenv CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/g++ setenv CUDA_HOME /usr/local/cuda-8.0 setenv INCLUDE_PATH /usr/local/cuda-8.0/include:/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/include#:$INCLUDE_PATH setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/lib:/uds_data/listic/install/cuda/cudnn-7.0.4_v7/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH #set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/gcc/build6.2/bin $path) setenv EXTRA_BAZEL_ARGS '-s --verbose_failures --ignore_unsupported_sandboxing --genrule_strategy=standalone --spawn_strategy=standalone --jobs 8' Hope it helps. Alex 2018-02-07 3:18 GMT+01:00 lucy-itjob <notifications@github.com>:
…
albenoit , Thank you for your information I have devtoolset-4 gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 on rel6 ############# ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ scl enable devtoolset-4 bash ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ which gcc /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ gcc --version gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 20150902 (Red Hat 5.2.1-2) ############ I follow your instruction, 357 14:28 unzip ../bazel-0.8.0-dist.zip 361 14:34 ./compile.sh it hang in there like this ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ ./compile.sh ðŸ�ƒ Building Bazel from scratch no respose, Could you please attach your 10:58 AM tools/cpp/CROSSTOOL file here, so that I can compare? Thank you for all your helps in advance — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#8529 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ACf6SAdKSjz94MW2SEXg7K2gV_eFerfHks5tSQgQgaJpZM4Mhr7n> .
-- Alexandre BENOIT, Associate Professor / Maître de Conférence Image processing and visual scene classification, LISTIC Lab / IUT Annecy https://sites.google.com/site/benoitalexandrevision/
body_text:
The surprisin thing is that this time, i did not modify any file and it
worked (for previous versions i did changes in the crosstool, typically in
the local_linux toolchain, similarly to the tensorflow cross tool as i
showed you in the previous post.
However, i have several Environment variables set to help :
set path=(/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/bin $path)
set path=(/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin $path)
set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/bazel/bazel-0.8.0-dist/output/ $path)
set path=(/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin $path)
setenv PYTHONPATH
"/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/lib/python2.7/site-packages"
setenv JAVA_HOME
/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64/jre
setenv GRPC_JAVA_PLUGIN
/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/grpc/protoc-gen-grpc-java-0.15.0-linux-x86_64.exe
setenv CC /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
setenv CMAKE_C_COMPILER   /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
setenv CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/g++
setenv CUDA_HOME /usr/local/cuda-8.0
setenv INCLUDE_PATH
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include:/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/include#:$INCLUDE_PATH
setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/lib:/uds_data/listic/install/cuda/cudnn-7.0.4_v7/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
#set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/gcc/build6.2/bin $path)
setenv EXTRA_BAZEL_ARGS '-s --verbose_failures
--ignore_unsupported_sandboxing --genrule_strategy=standalone
--spawn_strategy=standalone --jobs 8'

Hope it helps.
Alex




2018-02-07 3:18 GMT+01:00 lucy-itjob <notifications@github.com>:
…
 albenoit ,

 Thank you for your information
 I have devtoolset-4 gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 on rel6
 #############
 ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ scl enable devtoolset-4 bash
 ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ which gcc
 /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
 ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ gcc --version
 gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 20150902 (Red Hat 5.2.1-2)

 ############
 I follow your instruction,

 357 14:28 unzip ../bazel-0.8.0-dist.zip
 361 14:34 ./compile.sh

 it hang in there like this
 ***@***.*** bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ ./compile.sh
 ðŸ�ƒ Building Bazel from scratch

 no respose, Could you please attach your 10:58 AM

 tools/cpp/CROSSTOOL file here, so that I can compare?

 Thank you for all your helps in advance

body:
The surprisin thing is that this time, i did not modify any file and it
worked (for previous versions i did changes in the crosstool, typically in
the local_linux toolchain, similarly to the tensorflow cross tool as i
showed you in the previous post.
However, i have several Environment variables set to help :
set path=(/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/bin $path)
set path=(/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin $path)
set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/bazel/bazel-0.8.0-dist/output/ $path)
set path=(/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin $path)
setenv PYTHONPATH
"/univ_home/UNIVSOFT/COMMON/python/2.7.6/lib/python2.7/site-packages"
setenv JAVA_HOME
/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.111-0.b15.el6_8.x86_64/jre
setenv GRPC_JAVA_PLUGIN
/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/grpc/protoc-gen-grpc-java-0.15.0-linux-x86_64.exe
setenv CC /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
setenv CMAKE_C_COMPILER   /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
setenv CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER /opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/g++
setenv CUDA_HOME /usr/local/cuda-8.0
setenv INCLUDE_PATH
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/include:/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/include#:$INCLUDE_PATH
setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/gpfs/MUST-DATA/listic/install/nccl/build/lib:/uds_data/listic/install/cuda/cudnn-7.0.4_v7/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
#set path=(/uds_data/listic/install/gcc/build6.2/bin $path)
setenv EXTRA_BAZEL_ARGS '-s --verbose_failures
--ignore_unsupported_sandboxing --genrule_strategy=standalone
--spawn_strategy=standalone --jobs 8'

Hope it helps.
Alex
